name: Family Park
description:
Visit our realistic VR Family Park and experience whole gama of emotions and a lot of fun. You can have rides all year, every time you want, in winter, at midnight, on monday? Our Park is always open for you! And all of this without waiting for your turn. Just sit in one of our absorbing attractions and enjoy it.


You have 15 kind of rides to choose, so just take your VR goggle and start from one of this great rides! We made it all for you in both options so you have easy rides and some really difficult ones. All animation are really realistic and engaging.


All rides includes some special “Exit button” which will stop any rides in anytime you want.


Play it, feel it, enjoy it!
